recipe_name: Pasta bows with olives, mozzarella and peppers
author: Lesley Waters
method: Bring to the boil a large pan of salted water. Cook the pasta bows in the water, following the instructions on the packet for timing. Blend the garlic, basil and olive oil in a bowl with a hand blender to make a pesto. When the pasta is cooked, drain and allow to cool slightly.  To serve, put the pasta in a bowl, add all the other ingredients and mix. Drizzle with olive oil and serve.
ingredients: 200g/7oz farfelle,  1 garlic clove ,  small handful fresh basil leaves,  1 tbsp olive oil, plus more for drizzling,  50g/2oz olives, stones removed, roughly chopped,  1 ball mozzarella, torn into bite-sized pieces ,  2 baby red peppers from a jar, sliced
